text: our businesses while really successful
were very much traditional retail
businesses they relied on stores uh
operating through relatively manual
processes and efficiency through a lot
of people
power as a major retailer in Australia
New Zealand we really needed a
technology stack to increase the overall
profitability of the business but
service our customers better we needed
to execute the initiatives of change
that were meaningful to our business and
that's really where the move to Cloud
made the most sense for us as an
organization as we went through the
process of really choosing our partners
especially in the cloud space uh what we
found was that the AWS platform really
helped us in terms of its capability and
the maturity around the platform uh so
AWS really came to the party uh with a
modern Cloud technology stack that we
were able to pick up make fit for
purpose for our business uh and then
proceed to migrate uh a lot of our old
applications onto modernizing them and
had an amazing result for our business
center customers well we have a
substantial amount of our business over
20% of our sales are going through our
online channels um before that was
around 5% so we've seen a massive
increase in that helping our customers
there a stat that I'm particularly proud
of is the reduction in our carbon
footprint for technology uh roughly
about 72% reduction there there uh so
that's a great contributor to our
sustainability objectives that we're
seeking as well overall though our
team's working much more effectively
than it was before we've got much more
stable operational systems which just
mean we're more reliable and always
there for our business
